DOC.brief_summary: A study healthy subject mild asthmatic investigate Pharmacokinetics AZD5423 administer different way .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Healthy Subjects Mild Asthmatics Investigate Pharmacokinetics AZD5423 When Administered Different Ways
DOC.criteria: Male healthy subject male asthma patient age 18 45 year ( inclusive ) Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive rounding allow ) weight 50 100 kg ( inclusive ) Be able inhale SPIRA nebuliser Ineb® accord provide instruction Asthma patient fulfil follow criterion : Prebronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) ≥70 % predict normal value Asthma diagnosis accord GINA guideline history episodic wheeze shortness breath History clinically significant disease disorder Any clinically relevant abnormal finding Current smoker Asthma patient : Worsening asthma respiratory infection within 6 week screen Asthma patient : Use inhale , nasal , oral , rectal parenteral corticosteroid within 30 day first administration investigational product study
